pages.text: You can make many contraptions and machines fufilling various roles in the world of Requiem through Create.$(br2)Among the most useful of these is the mixer, as after firing it up with a blaze burner it can be used to create steel for more powerful weapons and armor.$(br2)

Create is a mod too complicated to be entirely covered in this entry.$(br2)The best way for you to get acclimated to its features is to look up $(l)'@create'$() in JEI and use the ponder feature to get a grasp on how the various mechanisms work.
